name: Genesis Simple Headers
author: wp.insider, vegasgeek

sections.description: This plugin lets you use the WordPress Appearance -> Header functionality to upload a custom logo or header for your site using the Genesis Theme Framework.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire genesis-simple-headers folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. On the ‘Appearance’ menu, click ‘Headers’
  4. Upload a logo or header
sections.changelog:
2.4

  • Removing the no support message.

2.3

  • Added support for CopyBlogger theme
  • Did NOT add support for other new StudioPress themes that already have header support built in to the theme. Including: Appirition, Decor, Luscious, Metro, Modern, Pretty Pictures, Quattro, Stretch
  • Did NOT add support for the Mindstream theme as it doesn’t include a header image.

2.2

  • Added support for version 2.x of the following themes: Agency, Education, Executive, Going Green, Mocha

2.1

  • Added support for all 1.x and 2.x Genesis child themes

2.0.1

  • Removed Beta from version number – ugh

2.0

  • Rewrote plugin
  • Added support for all standard Genesis child themes
  • Added standard / advanced settings to appearance -> headers tab

1.0.3

  • Fixed issue with Outreach theme

1.0.2

  • Added support for Generate theme
  • Replaced depricated function call, but left backwards compatability
  • Fixed issue with Agency theme support

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Adds WordPress Appearance -> Header functionality to upload a custom logo or header for your site using the Genesis Theme Framework.
description: This plugin lets you use the WordPress Appearance -> Header functionality to upload a custom logo or header for your site using the Genesis Theme Framework.
